intro.text: Launched in late 2023 under the umbrella of Mandarin Gaming N.V., Casinobet positions itself as a modern crypto-first casino designed with international players in mind, including those from Canada. The platform holds a valid license issued by the Curaçao Gaming Control Board (OGL/2024/907/0376), setting a regulatory foundation for safe and transparent play. With an eye-catching, intuitive design, the site supports over 4,000 titles from leading providers such as Evolution, Pragmatic Play, NetEnt, Hacksaw Gaming, BGaming, Spribe, Red Tiger, NoLimit City, and more. Among its standout features are rock-solid SSL protection, a light/dark mode toggle, no-KYC gameplay via crypto deposits, and the innovative “Wager Together” feature that lets players stake in real time during live events .

Registration.text: Registering at 24 Casinobet is streamlined and welcoming to both crypto-enthusiasts and newcomers wanting to enter the world of crypto-casino gaming. First, you’ll land on an attractive homepage prompting you to register. This landing experience makes the process clear and friendly. Once you click the Register button, a concise form appears. You enter your email address, create a secure password, and choose to specify a crypto wallet address or opt for instant crypto purchase via Moonpay. Upon submitting, you’ll receive a confirmation email to activate your account. Crypto players can skip KYC entirely, while fiat purchases via Moonpay may require standard verification. Step-by-step Registration Guide:

items: Navigate to casinobet.com and click Register.
Provide email, password, and crypto wallet or buy crypto with Moonpay.
Confirm via the link sent to your email.
Bypass KYC if depositing directly in crypto.

Registration.text: After registration, you’re instantly placed into the main lobby, where you can see promoted games, welcome offers, and ongoing tournaments, enabling immediate interaction without delays.

Casinobet Login.text: Logging in is equally intuitive, blending accessibility with security. On the homepage, a straightforward Login button invites users to enter credentials. Advanced players may also tack on 2‑Factor Authentication (2FA), which enhances account protection significantly. The interface is clean and uncluttered, ensuring users land in the game lobby with minimal fuss. Step-by-step Login Guide:

items: Click Login on the top navigation.
Enter email or username and password.
(Optional) Enable 2FA via email or authenticator app for extra security.

Casinobet Login.text: Once inside, you'll notice a few security features still functioning in the background: padded SSL/TLS encryption, encrypted user database, and DDoS protection ensuring safe and uninterrupted access .

items: Cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Litecoin (LTC), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP).
Moonpay: embedded buy-in widget lets users purchase crypto via credit card or bank transfer.

For fiat withdrawal, users first withdraw crypto, then convert via Moonpay, typical for crypto casinos.

Games Available to Play.text: Casinobet Casino takes pride in its diverse game portfolio, tailored to satisfy every type of player, from slot lovers to table game strategists and crash game fans. As soon as you enter the lobby, you’ll see categories and filters for slots, live games, crash, table games, and more. The search bar is smart, adapting to keywords like “volatility” or “megaways” for quick game discovery. The main categories are described below:

FAQ.text: Is Casinobet legal and licensed in Canada?
Yes. It holds a valid Curaçao license (OGL/2024/907/0376), which is accepted for Canadian play as long as no provincial blocks exist .
What rewards does the welcome bonus include?
A 150% match up to 1 BTC plus up to 500 free spins (50 per C$50 deposit), with only 5× wagering required.
Withdrawals are processed instantly or within 30 minutes; converting to fiat via Moonpay may add delays .
Is KYC required for Canadian users?
No, unless using Moonpay for fiat purchases. Crypto deposits and withdrawals can be done with no documentation .
How many and what types of games are available?
Over 4,000 titles including slots, live casino, RNG table games, and crash games, from top-tier providers.
